Let’s make smart moves and avoid unnecessary eliminations. Best of luck to all!"

Transparency is key, but so is adaptability. Let’s communicate openly, weigh our options carefully, and avoid rash decisions. I’m open to discussions with anyone who shares this mindset. Looking forward to a dynamic round—may the best strategist prevail!"

I’m flexible and happy to collaborate with transparency-minded players like P2/P7 and anyone similar. If we click, I’ll be loyal and useful. Let’s keep this efficient.
